Class AssistantListManager

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.gui.scene.gamecomponents.AssistantListManager
public class AssistantListManager extends Object
Layout manager for the available assistants list

    • AssistantListManager

      public AssistantListManager (javafx.scene.layout.Pane assistantsPane, javafx.beans.binding.BooleanBinding shouldBeEnabled, javafx.beans.binding.ListExpression<AssistantType> playerAssistants, BiConsumer<javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent,AssistantType> onAssistantClick)

      Parameters:
      assistantsPane - The root pane in which to inject dynamic content
      shouldBeEnabled - Boolean binding indicating whether the layout should be interactive
      playerAssistants - The list of the assistants available to this player
      onAssistantClick - Handler for when an assistant is clicked
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any parameter is null

  • Method Details

    • startManaging

      public void startManaging()
      Start reactively managing the layout.

      Note: the absence of a stopManaging() here is intentional. The lifecycle of each GameState object is as long as that of its view. Therefore, we have to worry only about internal cleanup between relayouts.

    • layout

      private void layout (javafx.collections.ObservableList<? extends AssistantType> list)
      Cleans the slate and injects up-to-date content into the root pane.
      Parameters:
      list - the assistants list
